h1_38: The MetroHealth System/Case Western Reserve University Program
h3_39: The MetroHealth System/Case Western Reserve University
p_64: Dashes ("-") indicate data for a particular field are not provided for this program in Residency Explorer. Reasons why data are not being provided can vary (e.g., they are not reported or available, they are not applicable, or they are based on an insufficient number of people for reporting purposes).

th_99: # of Residents Who Were Graduates of a Joint MD-PhD program
p_102: MetroHealth's Level 1 trauma center and multiple intensive care units provide a great environment for learning. Our IR/DR Residency and IR Independent Fellowship are now combined with The Cleveland Clinic. For more information please go to: https://my.clevelandclinic.org/departments/imaging/medical-professionals/residency-programs/interventional-radiology-residency. We also have the ESIR Track available for you to apply within our program.

p_356: The race/ethnicity data are shown alone or in combination with other race/ethnicity responses. Because some individuals may report multiple races/ethnicities, the totals may not equal 100%. Only residents who are U.S. citizens or permanent residents are included in race/ethnicity counts.
